required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study To Evaluate Escalating Doses Of A Vaccine-Based Immunotherapy Regimen For Prostate Cancer (PrCa VBIR)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study To Evaluate The Safety, Pharmacokinetics And Pharmacodynamics Of Escalating Doses Of A Vaccine-based Immunotherapy Regimen (Vbir) For Prostate Cancer (Pf-06753512)

brief_summary.textblock: The study will evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of increasing doses of a vaccine-based immunotherapy regimen for patients with prostate cancer.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence and grade of treatment-emergent adverse events including DLTs
primary_outcome.description: DLTs in order to determine the maximum tolerated dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Immune response to the selected prostate cancer tumor-antigens
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to Cycle 1 Day 85 and then every 29 and 99 days thereafter up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Antibody response specific to the PSMA antigen
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to Cycle 1 Day 85 and then every 29 and 99 days thereafter up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed plasma concentration of tremelimumab (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum concentration of tremelimumab (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from time zero extrapolated to infinity of tremelimumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough concentrations after multiple doses of tremelimumab (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and titers of anti-drug antibodies against tremelimumab
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to Cycle 1 Day 85 and then on Day 1 and Day 29 of each cycle thereafter up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed plasma concentration of sunitinib (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day -15, Day -1 at 0 hour, 2, 4 and any time between 6 to 12 hours after sunitinib dosing; Day 1 and Day 29 of Cycle 1; Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycles up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum concentration of sunitinib (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day -15, Day -1 at 0 hour, 2, 4 and any time between 6 to 12 hours after sunitinib dosing; Day 1 and Day 29 of Cycle 1; Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycles up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Steady state area under the curve during one dose interval of sunitinib (AUCtau)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day -15, Day -1 at 0 hour, 2, 4 and any time between 6 to 12 hours after sunitinib dosing; Day 1 and Day 29 of Cycle 1; Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycles up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and titers of neutralizing antibodies against PF-06801591
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From baseline up to Cycle 1 Day 85 and then on Day 1 and Day 29 of each cycle thereafter up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed plasma concentration of PF-06801591 (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum concentration of PF-06801591 (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve from time zero extrapolated to infinity of PF-06801591
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Trough concentrations after multiple doses of PF-06801591 (Ctrough)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose on Day 1, Day 29, Day 85 of Cycle 1; pre-dose on Day 29 of Cycle 2 and subsequent cycle up to 3 years

intervention.description: PF-06755992 will be administered on Day 1 of each cycle. Two dose levels will be evaluated.
PF-06755990 will be administered using a device on Day 29, 57 and 85 of each cycle.
TDS-IM electroporation device and associated supplies will be used for PF-06755990 administration
PF-06753388 will be administered every 28 days. Two dose levels will be evaluated.
Sunitinib will be taken daily. Up to three dose levels may be evaluated to determine the MTD when given in combination with the PrCa VBIR.
PF-06801591 will be administered every 28 days. Two dose levels will be evaluated.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histological or cytological diagnosis of prostate cancer
- Adequate bone marrow, kidney and liver function
- Hormone sensitive relapsing prostate cancer after definitive local therapy (biochemical relapse) OR
- Progressive disease post-surgical castration or during androgen suppression therapy (pre-secondary hormone CRPC) OR
- Failed prior therapy with a secondary hormone (e.g. enzalutamide, abiraterone) with documented progressive disease (post-secondary hormone CRPC)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Cancer-related pain requiring scheduled opioid narcotics for control
- ECOG performance status greater than or equal to 2
- Concurrent immunotherapy for prostate cancer
- History of or active autoimmune disorders or history of inflammatory bowel disorders
- Current use of any implanted electronic stimulation device
- For biochemically relapsed patients, no concurrent use of ADT or orchiectomy and no known prior or current evidence of any metastatic involvement of distant organs
- For pre-secondary hormone patients, no prior or concurrent treatment with a secondary hormone (e.g. enzalutamide, abiraterone) and no metastasis to organ systems other than lymph nodes and/or bone
- For post-secondary hormone patients, no concurrent treatment with a secondary hormone (e.g. enzalutamide, abiraterone), no metastasis to the liver or brain

facility.name: Smilow Cancer Hospital at Yale-New Haven
National Institutes of Health Clinical Center
Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center, Sidney Kimmel Center
Thomas Jefferson University, Sidney Kimmel Cancer Center
